price: Shin fa, sun amince cẽwa wata masĩfa daga azãbar Allah ta zo musu ko kuwa Tãshin ¡iyãma ta zo musu kwatsam, alhãli sũ ba su sani ba?
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُوٓاْ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ غَٰشِيَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū an tatiyahum ghāshiyatun min ʿadhābi al-lahi aw tatiyahumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
